Keywords: Utopia , X-Factor , X-Men
Real Name: Scott Summers
Special Powers
TARGETING: Destroy Blocking
LEAD BY EXAMPLE: Leadership, but increases action total by +2 instead of +1.
KEEP IT MOVING, X-MEN: When Cyclops hits, until your next turn friendly characters with the X-Men keyword can use Sidestep.

Comments
July 7, 2021
WelcomeToDIE
I'd find his second trait more useful if pretty much every single character didn't have Sidestep as their default speed power already. Even Blob has Sidestep now...
July 1, 2021
Organous
The 50 point version [b]also[/b] gives you +2 actions: 1 from the standard Leadership and another 1 from the free attack you get to make. A second general action + the potential to give everyone Sidestep is not worth all that you could be getting from its 50 point version for the 10 point difference. Sorry, even at a reduced value this is not worth using. Garbage card.
July 1, 2021
UncorkedMonk
40 points for +2 action leadership in today's game is HUGE! He will definitely see play for that reason alone. Being a decent attacker and potentially granting all your X-Men sidestep is just a bonus.
